pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Thursday, April 6, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Montréal, Quebec

1:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit a local grocery store. He will meet with families and employees to discuss the Grocery Rebate delivered by Budget 2023—A Made-in-Canada Plan: Strong Middle Class, Affordable Economy, Healthy Future.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

1:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media scrum.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:50 p.m.
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
